opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 6th day of April 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal in the above-captioned case is GRANTED, limited to the question of whether the grant of a special exception under an applicable zoning code may be conditioned on the applicant’s later compliance with the express requirements for the special exception.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
